header_section.title: Buy and sell Cardano Indonesia 24 hours
header_section.description: The largest Cardano trading platform in Indonesia since 2015. Easy, anytime & anywhere 24 hours without holidays. Triv is integrated with 61 banks & E-money in Indonesia, since 2015 Triv is used by millions of people to transact ADA.

liquiditas.title: High Liquidity
liquiditas.content: Spread or the difference in the buying and selling price of Bitcoin Triv is one of the lowest in the market today. With our brokerage system you do not need to wait for other buyers / sellers to make transactions. All buying / selling transactions can be done instantly and in real-time without a waiting process.
liquiditas.content_3: in the market today. With our brokerage system you don't have to wait for other buyers/sellers to make transactions. All buy/sell transactions can be done instantly and in real-time without waiting.

regulator.title: Regulated and Insured
regulator.content: Since 2015 Triv has been used by millions of people, all customer funds in our system are insured by Bitgo and Lloyd England for 100 million USD or the equivalent of 1.45 trillion rupiah. Triv is an authorized broker registered and supervised by Bappebti.

layanan_section.title: What You Can Do With Triv Cardano Service Indonesia
layanan_section.title_1: What You Can Do With Triv
layanan_section.content: Triv supports a wide variety of transactions and not just buying and selling. Whether it's swaps, staking or anything else you can do in one application. Triv is the app with the most comprehensive features to manage and grow your portfolio.

jual_beli.title: Buy and Sell Cardano 24 hours
jual_beli.content: Unlike traditional investment instruments, Crypto market has no holidays. You can sell your Cardano in real-time to your bank / e-wallet in seconds even on holidays.

kirim.title: Send Cardano
kirim.content: Since it is digital, sending Cardano can be as easy as sending an email. Crypto also doesn't have any physical borders the way dollars or euros do. We may call it the future currency. Sending Cardano is free of charge from a fellow Triv users!

terima.title: Receive Cardano
terima.content: You can receive Cardano through your Triv account instantly. Since crypto is unlimited financial ecosystem.

hoddl.title: HODL Cardano
hoddl.content: The fact is Cardano HODLER get higher returns compared with Cardano trader. Therefore, HODL your Cardano in Triv, in protection under insurance of Bigo & Llyod England up to USD100 million or equivalent to 1.45 trillion Rupiahs.

swap.title: Swap Cardano
swap.content: There are 1000+ supported cryptocurrencies in Triv platform and counting. You can enjoy the benefits of the 24/7 crypto staking service in real time.

isi_pulsa.title: Top Up Credit and Pay Bills
isi_pulsa.content: Exchange your ADA coins to Triv rupiah wallet and use it for various purposes such as topping up credit, paying bills and even buying electricity tokens.

live_chat.title: Average LiveChat Responds
live_chat.content: Triv's Livechat and Call center are ready to assist you.

processing.title: Average Processing Time
processing.content: All Triv transactions run automatically and without downtime. Since 2015, Triv has never experienced downtime that disrupts customer transactions

ewallet_section.description: All Triv rupiah deposits and withdrawals are processed instantly within minutes to various banks and e-wallets. Need funds in the middle of the night? Done! No need to wait until the next day.Unlike the stock and mutual fund markets, digital assets do not have holidays, all deposit and withdrawal transactions are processed 24 hours including on holidays.
